propertyFunction.description: (deprecated) Creates an Inspire Identifier structure. For the local ID part a source property is used, while the namespace is derived from information supplied for country, provider and product. For new mappings please map to the individual properties of the INSPIRE identifier (e.g. localId, namespace) directly.
propertyFunction.name: Inspire Identifier [deprecated]

functionParameter.description: The two letter ISO 3166 code of the member state the data provider is associated with, or an underscore ("_") if the data provider is not associated with (only) one member state.
functionParameter.label: Country
functionParameter.name: countryName

functionParameter.description: The identifier of the data provider.
functionParameter.label: Provider
functionParameter.name: providerName

functionParameter.description: The identifier of the product the feature is part of.
functionParameter.label: Product
functionParameter.name: productName

functionParameter.description: Specify the reason why a version is not present.
functionParameter.label: Version NilReason
functionParameter.name: versionNilReason

propertyFunction.description: (deprecated) Create an Inspire Geographical Name structure, for one or more source properties that are used as spelling.
propertyFunction.name: Geographical Name [deprecated]

functionParameter.description: The name of a source property to be used for the spelling text. The spelling text is the way the name is written.
functionParameter.label: Spelling Text
functionParameter.name: text

functionParameter.description: A script for each spelling text. The script is a set of graphic symbols (e.g. an alphabet) employed in writing the name, expressed using the four letters codes defined in ISO 15924, where applicable.
functionParameter.label: Spelling Script
functionParameter.name: script

functionParameter.description: A transliteration scheme for each spelling text. The transliteration scheme is the method used for the names conversion between different scripts.
functionParameter.label: Spelling Transliteration
functionParameter.name: transliterationScheme

functionParameter.description: Qualitative information enabling to discern which credit should be given to the name with respect to its standardisation and/or its topicality.
functionParameter.label: Name Status
functionParameter.name: nameStatus

functionParameter.description: Language of the name, given as a three letters code, in accordance with either ISO 639-3 or ISO 639-5.
functionParameter.label: Language
functionParameter.name: language

functionParameter.description: Information enabling to acknowledge if the name is the one that is/was used in the area where the feature is situated at the instant when the name is/was in use.
functionParameter.label: Nativeness
functionParameter.name: nativeness

functionParameter.description: Original data source from which the geographical name is taken from and integrated in the data set providing/publishing it. For some named spatial objects it might refer again to the publishing data set if no other information is available.
functionParameter.label: Source of name
functionParameter.name: sourceOfName

functionParameter.description: Proper, correct or standard (standard within the linguistic community concerned) pronunciation of a name, expressed in International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA).
functionParameter.label: Pronunciation IPA
functionParameter.name: pronunciationIPA

functionParameter.description: Proper, correct or standard (standard within the linguistic community concerned) pronunciation of a name, expressed by a link to any sound file.
functionParameter.label: Pronunciation Sound Link
functionParameter.name: pronunciationSoundLink

functionParameter.description: Classes of nouns reflected in the behaviour of associated words.
functionParameter.label: Grammatical Gender
functionParameter.name: grammaticalGender

functionParameter.description: Grammatical category of nouns that expresses count distinctions.
functionParameter.label: Grammatical Number
functionParameter.name: grammaticalNumber

category.description: Functions related to Inspire specific structures
category.name: Inspire
